Source.Name: perl-File-Copy-Inplace
Source.Summary: File::Inplace is a perl module intended to ease the common task of editing a file in-place.
Source.Description: File::Inplace is a perl module intended to ease the common task of editing a file in-place. Inspired by variations of perl's -i option, this module is intended for somewhat more structured and reusable editing than command line perl typically allows.
